amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $450 million from the Land and Water Conservation Fund to the Urban Park and Recreation, Farmland Protection, and Endangered and Threatened Species Recovery programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 106-612 to increase funding for the Urban Parks and Recreation Recovery Act program by $225,000,000 over the current bill; to increase funding for the Farmland Protection program by $125,000,000 over the current bill; and to increase funding for the Endangered and Threatened Species Recovery program by $100,000,000, also over the current bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tancredo amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 315 (Roll no. 162).
